Quick Transforms and Functions for Preparing data for modeling

Logit Transformation of Vector

invLogit()

Inverse Logit Transformation of Vector

center()

Center matrix (subtract row mean from each row)

onehot()

Tidy Bayesian Functions

Shortcut for summarize variable with quantiles and mean

Other Assorted Functions

add_array_dim()

Add 1 dimension to array

split_along_dim()

Split Multidimeninal array to a list along a specified dimension

bdiag()

Create Block Diagonal Matrix from Passed Matricies

any_cases_array() all_cases_array()

Test for any/all non-NA along margin

dmode()

Mode of a vector x

lower_triangle_factors()

Vector to lower diagonal of matrix formed from factor by factor

vec_to_mat()

Check if Vector and if so, Convert to Row Matrix

array_apply_1D_function()

Apply Function to 1 dimension of array along all others
